name: Collecton
description:
Collecton is a roguelike-platformer with heavy emphasis put into interaction with the world's creatures, items and exploration.

The Android build is experimental, it's pretty slow. Linux and MacOS builds are untested.

Devblog: http://danbrani.tumblr.com/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/gutttz

Twitter: https://twitter.com/danbrani

Watch me dev on twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/danbrani

Contact: danbest12@gmail.com
